author: josephperrott
message:
build: update pullapprove to remove @matsko from reviewer lists (#38146)

With @matsko leaving the Angular team, we need to update the pullapprove
configuration to reflect his no longer being a reviewer for file groups
throughout the repository.

PR Close #38146

files.patch:
@@ -175,7 +175,6 @@ groups:
          - kara                    # Kara Erickson
          - kyliau                  # Keen Yee Liau
          - manughub                # Manu Murthy
-         - matsko                  # Matias Niemela
          - mgechev                 # Minko Gechev
          - mhevery                 # Mi≈°ko Hevery
          - mmalerba                # Miles Malerba
@@ -206,7 +205,9 @@ groups:
           ])
     reviewers:
       users:
-        - matsko
+        - crisbeto
+        - IgorMinar
+        - jelbourn
